; diagonal transition from avenue to road (compact version)
  0x5f47f100,0,0,0x04000200,2,0=0x5F47F100,0,0,0x5F47F200,0,0
  0x5F47F100,2,0,0x00000A00,1,0=0x5F47F100,2,0,0x5F47F000,2,0
  ; mirror
  0x5f47f100,2,1,0x04000200,3,0=0x5F47F100,2,1,0x5F47F200,2,1
  0x5F47F100,0,1,0x00000A00,2,0=0x5F47F100,0,1,0x5F47F000,0,1

; diagonal transition from avenue to road (full version)
  ; row 1 (stub-to-stub initialize)
  0x00000200,2,0,0x04004200,3,0=0x5F47F400,0,0,0x5F47F500,0,0
  0x00000200,2,0,0x04004200,0,1=0x5F47F400,0,0,0x5F47F500,0,0
    ; stabilize
    0x5F47F400,0,0,0x04004200,3,0=0x5F47F400,0,0,0x5F47F500,0,0
    0x5F47F400,0,0,0x04004200,0,1=0x5F47F400,0,0,0x5F47F500,0,0
    0x00000200,2,0,0x5F47F500,0,0=0x5F47F400,0,0,0x5F47F500,0,0
    ; mirror - covered by short transition code
  ; row 1 extend 
  0x5f47f500,0,0,0x04001000,0,1=0x5f47f500,0,0,0x5f47f600,0,0
    ; mirror
    0x5f47f500,2,1,0x04001000,2,0=0x5f47f500,2,1,0x5f47f600,2,1
  ; row 2 col 1 from row 1 col 1
  0x5f47f500,3,0,0x04001000,2,0=0x5f47f500,3,0,0x5f47f700,3,0
    ; mirror
    0x5f47f500,1,1,0x04001000,0,1=0x5f47f500,1,1,0x5f47f700,1,1
  ; row 2 col 2 from row 1 col 2
  0x5f47f600,3,0,0x04003800,1,0=0x5f47f600,3,0,0x5f47f800,3,0
  0x5f47f600,3,0,0x04003800,3,0=0x5f47f600,3,0,0x5f47f800,3,0
    ; mirror
    0x5f47f600,1,1,0x04003800,0,0=0x5f47f600,1,1,0x5f47f800,1,1
    0x5f47f600,1,1,0x04003800,2,0=0x5f47f600,1,1,0x5f47f800,1,1
  ; row 2 extend
  0x5f47f800,0,0,0x04000200,2,0=0x5f47f800,0,0,0x5f47f900,0,0
    ; mirror
    0x5f47f800,2,1,0x04000200,3,0=0x5f47f800,2,1,0x5f47f900,2,1
  ; row 0 from row 1
  0x5f47f400,1,0,0x00000a00,2,0=0x5f47f400,1,0,0x5f47f300,1,0
    ; mirror
    0x5f47f400,3,1,0x00000a00,1,0=0x5f47f400,3,1,0x5f47f300,3,1
